description.full: May purchase a single tank and single helicopter.
Any weapon with 3 ammo has 4 ammo.

description.short: Cause massive damage to gain Audience Votes. See page 48.
description.full: If a vehicle causes 6+ hits in one attack, before evades, gain +1 Audience Vote.

description.short: May push it without gaining a Hazard Token. See page 48.
description.full: The first time each vehicle pushes it, they do not gain a Hazard Token.

description.short: Improve evade rolls by gaining Hazard Tokens. See page 49.
description.full: Before making an evade roll, gain Hazard Tokens to add +1 to each evade dice for every Hazard Token.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes by spinning, sliding and shifting. See page 49.
description.full: Gain an Audience Vote for each vehicle, if all vehicles resolved a spin, slide and shift result.

description.short: May purchase electrical weapons and upgrades.
description.full: May purchase electrical weapons and upgrades.

description.short: Extra ammo for electrical weapons or upgrades. See page 49.
description.full: After a vehicle activates in Phase 4, 5, or 6, add +1 Ammo Token to a single electrical weapon or upgrade.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes for using a new type of weapon. See page 49.
description.full: When attacking with a type of weapon that has not been attacked with this game, gain +1 Audience Vote.
May purchase the Nitro upgrade at half cost.

description.short: Gain fewer Hazard Tokens when using a Nitro. See page 49.
description.full: When a vehicle uses Nitro, only gain up to 3 Hazard Tokens.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes for long straights. See page 49.
description.full: When a vehicle selects a long straight in gear phase 1, 2, or 3, gain +1 Audience Vote.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes for having Hazard Tokens. See page 49.
description.full: If a vehicle begins the wipeout step with more Hazard Tokens than hull points, +1 Audience Vote.

description.short: Move again after a sideswipe. See page 49.
description.full: If a vehicle is involved in a sideswipe smash, immediately resolves another movement step.

description.short: May purchase the Prison Car upgrade. See page 49.
description.full: May purchase the Prison Car upgrade.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes for exploding. See page 49.
description.full: If a vehicle explodes, gain +1 Audience Vote if it is middleweight and +2 Audience Vote if it is heavyweight.
